positive.review: A very relaxing and calming game to enjoy with your friends! Remind me of the teamwork in the original Battletoads! No friends will yell at you or hurt your feelings or threaten you while playing this very relaxing game!

This is an amazing game and I even went and bought the newer client but I wish there was a dark mode version of this game, when I lure my friends in to play this game I often can't get them to stick around more than 30mins due to how you feel like youre constantly being blinded. 
Please devs, Dark Mode.

Banger game

100/100 break your relationship with your friends

Very recommended

Pico park classic edition is a platformer game where you control two characters trying to solve puzzles for the game by collecting a key. Its okay and I recommend it for a short time and its free as well to play. Very simple to play as well.
If y'all want a calm, chilling, but still enjoyable game to play with friends PICO Park is one of the best choice. :>
its fun and free great for freinds online or couch coop
It's great, not only because it's free, but also because it's free!
For some F-in reason my friends enjoyed playing this free game over the other co-op game that we paid for!
Great free game for playing coop. There are only 20 levels and take around 1 hours playing with a partner, but it serves as a preview for the paid version.
A very relaxing and calming game to enjoy with your friends.

Thank you for making this as free game

Fun & simple game to killing time with your friends
Pretty fun, but short. The game is fun if you like replaying levels a lot with your friends
A wonderfully soothing and peaceful game to experience together with your friends! Your friends won‚Äôt shout at you, offend you, or make any threats while enjoying this truly relaxing game!
fun with friends, even better if there is more people on the game
PICO PARK:Classic Edition is a cooperative local/online multiplay action puzzle game for 2-10 players.
PICO PARK:Classic Edition is a cooperative local/online multiplay action puzzle game for 2-10 players.

PICO PARK: Classic Edition is a *‚Äúcooperative action puzzle game for 2‚Äì10 players‚Äù* which is a very gentle way of saying:

> A chaos generator where you discover which of your friends should never be trusted with a jump key.

You and your buddies are tiny cats whose only goals are:

* Get the key
* Reach the door
* Not murder each other in real life

You will fail at at least one of these.

---

### Pros:

* Supports up to **10 players** on one screen, which is less ‚Äúvideo game‚Äù and more ‚Äúlocalized riot.‚Äù
* Simple rule: *everyone* must reach the door. Actual experience: one guy grief-jumping on the stack so no one can.
* Every level‚Äôs gimmick is designed around cooperation, which is adorable considering no one you play with knows what ‚Äúcooperation‚Äù means.
* Now free forever on Steam because the dev accidentally flipped the ‚Äúfree‚Äù switch and can‚Äôt turn it off again, which is the most PICO PARK thing imaginable.

---

### Cons:

* ‚ÄúPsychological Horror‚Äù tag is a joke‚Ä¶ until you play with 9 people and realize it‚Äôs actually accurate.
* One (1) person mistimes a jump and the whole team dies. Repeatedly. For 15 minutes.
* Voice chat devolves from ‚Äúokay, you jump now‚Äù to pure dolphin noises in under three stages.
* You will absolutely push the troll button just to see what it does. You will not be forgiven.

---

### Peak PICO PARK Moments:

* Carefully building a cat tower, then someone moves one pixel and scatters the entire stack like Jenga with feet.
* Level starts, everyone sprints right, key is left. Immediate, collective shame.
* ‚ÄúNobody move, just let ONE person push the block.‚Äù
  *Everyone moves.*
* Finishing a level and instantly queuing the next one because your friend is still mad and you‚Äôre not done yet.

---

10/10
It‚Äôs free, it‚Äôs simple, and it turns even the calmest friend group into a full co-op meltdown.
Would form a 10-cat totem pole, fall in a pit, and blame literally everyone else again.
Very fun couch coop style game that can be played online with friends. Super fun!

this game has made me say things like no other game has out of pure rage and hatred whilst playing with my friends

very 10/10 recommended

Short and fun game for an evening with friends.
The levels are interesting and not too difficult, except for a couple that we couldn‚Äôt quite figure out the logic behind. Unfortunately, there aren‚Äôt many levels, but for a free game, it‚Äôs more than enough. Definitely worth a try if you‚Äôre looking for a quick co-op experience.

I CAN RECOMMEND TO MY FRIEND EVEN MY GRANDMA.

After hearing the news that this game was going free, of course the first thing I did was go straight to its store page on Steam. This is one of the best games I've ever played with my friends, it was hilarious. I hope this game continues to get updates and new levels.
If I had a nickel for every time I've crashed out playing this game, I'd have 1 nickel. But yeah whatever I guess I had fun.
Me and 4 other people had so much fun playing this; absolutely would recommend if your friends aren't toxic :D

negative.review: My teammates were so fucking bad that I threw my headset out the window and almost followed it myself.

The game is boring, kids would probably like it. Yes, YouTubers said the game was difficult, but it turned out to be very easy. There were some interesting moments, but they ended up being boring too. Play it with your kids or parents; you won't lose any friends. In fact, we only grew closer, unfortunately.
a bland game. there is nothing new at all. the developer did some murky nonsense
shit game i cant join server goddamit
i am not very fond of the brown pico
You can't play with people in other regions apparently; so it might be fun, might not be. Guess we'll never know.
why would u weird fucks add region lock in i literally cant play with my (only) friends who live across the fucking ocean
Not able to join friend's room. The game server ain't working at all, can only play together using steam remote play and it's super laggy.
My teammates were so fucking bad that I threw my headset out the window and almost followed it myself.

The game is boring, kids would probably like it. Yes, YouTubers said the game was difficult, but it turned out to be very easy. There were some interesting moments, but they ended up being boring too. Play it with your kids or parents; you won't lose any friends. In fact, we only grew closer, unfortunately.
L GAME WHO THE FUCK MAKES A GAME ONLINE PLAY AND DOESNT ADD CROSS REGION PLAY LIKE THAT IS SOO STUPID 100% SCAM
with the magic thing company I could went thought the first few levels, then after that my two hands company can't help advance forward to this coop game.

I don't even know where to begin, Pico park looked so harmless -- a cute, cooperative little puzzle game. I thought it would be be lighthearted. I was wrong. Horribly wrong.

Every single level feels designed to drain your patience and test how far your sanity can stretch before it finally snaps. The puzzles are so absurdly dependent on cooperation. But it seems that this world cannot even come together just to beat a simple game. 

I've never seen a game turn laughter into rage so fast. You start smiling, thinking, "this is so fun and cute!" Ten minutes later, you're glaring at your friends, silently hoping every single natural disaster strikes their home. Killing everything they love. 

The fact that there is the HORRIBLE music in the background while you watch everything you love and desire fall apart in such a short amount of time. 

I hate this.
All my friends could find the server they created besides me, seems like because am in Russia or smth, whatever doesn't work, fix yo game
this is so cheeks worst game ive EVER played and ive played ALOT so delete ts game and NEVER make another game lil jit
wont let me play with my friends in other countries, very sad
a bland game. there is nothing new at all. the developer did some murky nonsense
Cant play with friends bc im in asia this game is racist
The ghost breaks the game if you play with one friend.
Literally can't join friends rooms,  fix your game
legit trash, even for free is too expensive.
Can't even join across region, crappy game
This game ruined my 10 years of friendship.Not recommend.
